ai-patthana24.17:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.17:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of quarrels, etc.
ai-patthana24.17:1.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of refuge, you don’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.17:1.1_1: Not for the sake of refuge or for the sake of refuge, and for the sake of a without reason.
ai-patthana24.17:1.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.17:2.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge or for the sake of both refuge and not for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana24.17:2.1_1: Not for the sake of refuge or for the sake of refuge, and for the sake of a without cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.17:2.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
